Description: Rectangular piece of painted limestone relief: part of a marsh-scene.
Curator's comments: Published: PM I Part 2, p. xx. L. Keimer, BIFAO XXXVI (1936), p.854. W.S. Smith, Boston Museum Bulletin XLVII, 25 (1949). Nina de Garies Davis, Egyptian Tomb Paintings, p.1, pl.24. Leclant, Montuemhat, 1961, p.182. B. Bothmer, Egyptian Sculpture of the Late Period, 1960, p.43.
